title: Don't say all chromas are available for Blue Essence if its not true
body: You're advertising on the home screen of the client that ALL chromas are available for Blue Essence until 11/27, but actually going into the store about 25% of them are still RP only, including Battlecast Urgot, Arcade Corki, etc. EIther you need to correct the sentence to "Select" instead of "All", or they ALL need to be available for purchase with Blue Essence, otherwise it is false advertising.
